sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update reference cascade rule for sys_flow_report_doc context field from delete to clear</description>
        <name>Update Report Doc Reference Cascade Rule</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[
            var dic = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
            dic.addQuery("name", "sys_flow_report_doc");
            dic.addQuery("element", "context");
            dic.query();

            if (dic.next()) {
                gs.info("reference_cascade_rule before change is " + dic.getValue("reference_cascade_rule"));
                dic.setValue("reference_cascade_rule", "clear");
                dic.setWorkflow(false);
                dic.update();
                gs.info("reference_cascade_rule after change is " + dic.getValue("reference_cascade_rule"));
            }
    ]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-21 22:33:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d0298d5f4326311027d274d6ebb8f28b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update Report Doc Reference Cascade Rule</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Flow Designer - Flow Engine Reporting" source="com.glide.hub.flow_reporting">82e978683cf1311068bcf327dfe37f59</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d0298d5f4326311027d274d6ebb8f28b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-21 22:33:55</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update Report Doc Reference Cascade Rule
